sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RHEXIA in botany : A genus of the monogynia order, belonging to the octandria clafs of plants ; and in the natural method ranking with thoſe of the 17th order, Calycanthemce. The calyx is quadriſid, with four petals inſerted into it ; the antheræ are declining ; the capſule is quadrilocular, within the belly of the calyx.
